Package com.complexible.common.io

Interface Summary
ByteReader Interface for components that can read bytes from a certain source.
ByteWriter Interface for components that can write bytes into a certain source.
CloneableByteReader Supports the clone operation which may be necessary if multiple clients read from the same source but may have different positions
Directory A Directory is responsible for the management of all the IOFiles in a certain location.
FlushableByteWriter  
IOFile An IOFile represents an element that supports several IO operations, depending on its IOFile.Mode.
ObjectWriter<T>  
ObjectWriterFactory<T>  
Page A Page represents a collection of bytes that can be written/read.
Page.Factory A factory to create Pages from PagedFiles
PageByteWriter  
PagedFile A PagedFile splits an IOFile into fixed-sized sections called Pages.
PagedFileFactory Factory interface for creating paged files
PageListener<T>  
PageManager A PageManager is responsible for the management of a set of PagedFiles and their Pages.
PageObjectWriter<T>  
Persistable An object that can be persisted
SegmentedFile Utility class to help with memory mapping very large files in relatively small segments.
 

Class Summary
BufferedBOMInputStream Combines Apache Harmony's BufferedInputStream with the BOM handling capability inspired by the UnicodeBOMInputStream class from this stackoverflow entry.
ByteOutput Implementation of DataOutput with a backing byte array that can be accessed directly.
ByteReaders Utility methods for working with ByteReaders
ByteWriters
Flusher Utility class for flushing, optionally asynchronously.
MMapUtil  
MultiOutputStream An OutputStream that multiplexes writes to all of its child streams.
SegmentedFileBuilder  
StringIO Utility class to get around the limitation that DataInput.readUTF() and DataOutput.writeUTF(String) cannot handle strings whose encoding exceed 64KB.
 

Enum Summary
BufferedBOMInputStream.BOM Type safe enumeration class that describes the different types of Unicode BOMs.
IOFile.Mode
